hero.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
hero.subtitle: Abdalla Yaser
hero.statement: Ambitious Full-Stack Working Student (B.Sc., University of Duisburg-Essen) with 3 years of comprehensive professional experience as a Software Engineer in developing scalable ERP systems (ASP.NET, React, SQL). Specialized in database optimization, which led to a 25% reduction in system response times when processing over 2 million data records. I am seeking a challenging role to directly contribute my proven technical leadership skills to innovative projects.

entries.degree: B.Sc. Electrical, Electronics and Communication Engineering (ISE)
entries.description: Recognition of credits from Zagazig University, Egypt (2022–2025). Focus: Software Development, Embedded Systems, Data Processing, Communication Technology.
In-depth study of hardware-software integration, embedded programming, and algorithm design.

projects.name: Catch the LED Game
projects.description: Two-player digital logic game with score tracking.

entries.description: Grade: 3.81/4 | Top 100 students in Egypt. Foundation in advanced mathematics and analytical problem-solving.

achievements: Built ERP modules for hospital & manufacturing systems using ASP.NET MVC + SQL Server → digitized patient data for 10+ medical facilities.
Enhanced UI with React, JavaScript, Bootstrap → 40% increase in user satisfaction.
Optimized SQL queries → 25% faster response, handling 2M+ records.
Developed RESTful APIs for 5+ enterprise apps.
Delivered 3 major projects on time in an 8-member team using Git + Azure DevOps.

entries.company: Digital Egypt Pioneers Initiative – Cairo, Egypt
achievements: 6-month intensive training in React.js, Node.js, modern web dev.
Applied Git workflows, API design, UX/UI standards.

entries.name: E-Receipt Tax Compliance System (Individual)
entries.tech: ASP.NET Core, SQL Server, Entity Framework, REST APIs, Bootstrap
description: Automated invoice submission to Egyptian Tax Authority → 500+ companies compliant.
Real-time ERP sync + financial analytics dashboard.
entries.result: 60% less manual work, full compliance, major cost savings.

Central SQL database with real-time inter-department sync.
entries.result: Deployed in 30+ hospitals, improved data flow & compliance.

entries.name: Pinion ERP System (Team of 6)

description: Modules: Inventory, HR, Finance, Access Control.
30% faster data processing, 45% less admin effort.
entries.result: Live in 15+ organizations, significant operational efficiency.

entries.description: Led 40+ tech projects, organized Arduino & web dev workshops.

entries.description: Organized health & donation drives for 4.5M+ people.
